name: The Four Sportsman Of The Apocalypse
name_original: The Four Sportsman Of The Apocalypse
description:
Unofficial entry for Ludum Dare 32

Controls:

360/XOne Pad:

A - Action

B - Skip cut-scene

Left Stick - Move

PS4 Pad:

X - Action

Circle - Skip cut-scene

Left Stick - Move

Keyboard:

Ctrl - Action

Shift - Skip cut-scene

Arrow keys - Move

Press Escape on your keyboard at any point to quit the game.

Made by Ade Cottrell and Tom Birchall for Ludum Dare 32: An Unconventional Weapon (the weapon in this game is "Sports")
